LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Mastiff.label: Gilnean Mastiff
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Mastiff.description: Mastiffs are a breed of dogs found primarily in Lordaeron. They appear to be common pets and companions of human societies, including vrykul. While mostly found domesticated, wild mastiffs can also be found in Gilneas.
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Mastiff.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Mastiff.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Mastiff.tools.3.label: head
